column4: Hi, I'm trying to remove some shortcuts that remain in   "Applications->Others", but when I press right-button on "Applications" and try to click on "Edit Menus" nothing happens (no menu appears)... How can I manually erase these files? Where are these files resident?
On left pane (Menus), be sure to highlight either "Applications" and untick "Other" on right pane.
Or on left pane "other" then untick whatever (on right).
